name: part_004
file: tmp_【#Myth5years】hololive English -Myth- 5th Anniversary Concert： Fortune Spinner [HT_HUFi8DJ4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Sepia' by Mori Calliope and Ninomae Ina'nis.
Instrumental transition featuring a heart-shaped crystal on stage.
Solo performance of 'Hiyururira Boppa' by Ninomae Ina'nis.
Ending transition, Takanashi Kiara joins Ina on stage.

subtitles.original: ...すか
言葉少なに貴方に捧ぐ
subtitles.english: I give to you silently

subtitles.original: 今に消えてしまいそうなこの命を
subtitles.english: My life that's about to burn out

subtitles.original: 鳴呼 愛おしいセピア色した
subtitles.english: Ah, and these sepia-toned sights

subtitles.original: 何より大事なこの景色を
subtitles.english: they're most precious of all

subtitles.original: もう少し見ていたいよな
subtitles.english: I wish I could see them a bit more...

subtitles.original: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy
subtitles.english: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy

subtitles.original: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me
subtitles.english: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me

subtitles.original: The angels on my shoulder still cannot agree
subtitles.english: The angels on my shoulder still cannot agree

subtitles.original: If I was somebody else, could I get everything?
subtitles.english: If I was somebody else, could I get everything?

subtitles.original: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy
subtitles.english: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy

subtitles.original: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me
subtitles.english: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me

subtitles.original: The devils on my shoulder never let me be
subtitles.english: The devils on my shoulder never let me be

subtitles.original: Obsessing over tomorrows that I'll never see
subtitles.english: Obsessing over tomorrows that I'll never see

subtitles.original: Somebody save me
subtitles.english: Somebody save me

subtitles.original: My world is caving in cuz I thought I deserved it all for free, yeah yeah
subtitles.english: My world is caving in cuz I thought I deserved it all for free, yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 遠き日の夢を見るたび
subtitles.english: Every time I dream of days gone by

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味を考えてしまうの
subtitles.english: I wonder why I came to be

subtitles.original: 鳴呼 美しい蒼い日々だな
subtitles.english: Ah, such beautiful, youthful days

subtitles.original: この目に焼き付けておこうかな
subtitles.english: I should burn their images into my mind

subtitles.original: もう少し強くなりたいとな
subtitles.english: But I'd have to be a little stronger first

subtitles.original: 晴れあらり 今踊り踊れ 恋焦がれ遊べ 桜手打て
subtitles.english: A sunny spell, now dance and dance, play in love's yearning, clap your hands like cherry blossoms

subtitles.original: はねにまぎれ 今音り戻せ 粋狂に遊べ さあここで踊れ
subtitles.english: Mingled in petals, now dance back, play whimsically, come dance right here

subtitles.original:
ひゆるりらぼっぱ
Lyrics, Music: tuki
subtitles.english:
Hiyururira Boppa
Lyrics, Music: tuki

subtitles.original: いざやお立ち また時が過ぎてく よりどりみどり 祭り囃子
subtitles.english: Now stand up, as time passes again, a plethora of choices, festival music

subtitles.original: あれのごらん 籠も放り込み よく身を見に行きたいた
subtitles.english: Look at that, throw in the basket too, I really want to go and see for myself

subtitles.original: 人生より道まわり道
subtitles.english: Life is a detour, a roundabout way

subtitles.original: 行きたいように生きられや
subtitles.english: Live as you wish to live

subtitles.original: 晴れあらり 今踊り踊れ 恋焦がれ遊べ 桜手打て
subtitles.english: A sunny spell, now dance and dance, play in love's yearning, clap your hands like cherry blossoms

subtitles.original: はねにまぎれ 今音り戻せ 粋狂に遊べ さあここで踊れ
subtitles.english: Mingled in petals, now dance back, play whimsically, come dance right here

subtitles.english: Yuru yururira, yururira boppa

subtitles.original: ゆるりお立ち また時は過ぎ去る 酸いも甘いも 祭り囃子
subtitles.english: Leisurely stand up, as time passes away again, both sour and sweet, festival music

subtitles.original: 味わい尽くしてしまいましょう さあ何から平らげよう
subtitles.english: Let's taste it all to the fullest, now, what shall we devour first?

subtitles.original: 人生気付けば山の如し
subtitles.english: Before you know it, life is like a mountain

subtitles.original: 命の花を打ち上げましょう
subtitles.english: Let's set off the flowers of life

subtitles.original: 花よ花よ 誇りなさい
subtitles.english: Oh flower, oh flower, be proud

subtitles.original: まごうことなく君のまま
subtitles.english: Unmistakably as you are

subtitles.original: 上を向いてごらんなさい
subtitles.english: Please look up

subtitles.original: 最後の日まで花であれ
subtitles.english: Be a flower until the final day

subtitles.original: 晴れあらり 今踊り踊れ 恋焦がれ遊べ 桜手打て

subtitles.english: A sunny spell, now dance and dance, let everyone and anyone play, clap your hands like cherry blossoms

subtitles.original: はなれ離れ でも花びら上げて 粋狂に遊べ さあここで踊れ
subtitles.english: Separated from each other, but let the petals rise, play whimsically, come dance right here
